text: "I d-d-don't sup-p-p-pose you here to kill that rich BASTARD, are ya?"
"Regadless of t-t-that, the DEVs are lazy A-A-A-holes, so this dungeon is incomplete!"
"And try to kill--- THAT R-RICH SUCKER!"
"B-b-but could you b-b-beat my little challenge?"
"Such a shame... I actually missed you, you know..."
"Now all you want is REVENGE... PATHETIC HELL-STRAY CAT"
"Si te gustan los gatitos y ruptura de la cuarta pared."
"Si te gustan los isekai y humor negro."
